Title: On the Job Training
Description:
Stoneheads use steam to run whole place. Have lava, have water, make sense.

Repairs not going well, we hear. No new parts from factory. "Against rules" to use scrap, been told. A lot.

Help get old machines work. We watch, learn. Maybe not get yelled at for helping.
ObjectivesText: Help Steamwarden Hurlt repair the steamworks.
RewardText:
Seem easy enough. Put steam in pipe, try not to cook self.

I get!
